data.lyric:
[ti:Psycho (Explicit)]
[ar:Post Malone/Ty Dolla $ign]
[al:Psycho]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Psycho (Explicit) - Post Malone/Ty Dolla $ign
[00:02.96]Lyrics by：Louis Bell/Austin Post/Tyrone Griffin/Carl Austin Rosen
[00:05.93]Composed by：Louis Bell/Austin Post/Tyrone Griffin/Carl Austin Rosen
[00:08.90]Produced by：Louis Bell/Post Malone
[00:11.87]Post Malone：
[00:12.46]D**n my AP goin' psycho lil' mama bad like Michael
[00:16.11]Can't really trust nobody with all this jewelry on you
[00:19.57]My roof look like a no-show got diamonds by the boatload
[00:22.96]Come with the Tony Romo for clowns and all the bozos
[00:26.46]My AP goin' psycho lil' mama bad like Michael
[00:29.87]Can't really trust nobody with all this jewelry on you
[00:33.26]My roof look like a no-show got diamonds by the boatload
[00:36.82]Don't act like you my friend when I'm rollin' through my ends though
[00:40.35]You stuck in the friend zone I tell that four-five the fifth ayy
[00:44.66]Hunnid bands inside my shorts DeChino the s**t ayy
[00:47.96]Try to stuff it all in but it don't even fit ayy
[00:51.45]Know that I been with the s**ts ever since a jit ayy
[00:54.71]I made my first million I'm like "s**t this is it" ayy
[00:58.30]30 for a walkthrough man we had that b***h lit ayy
[01:01.82]Had so many bottles gave ugly girl a sip
[01:04.76]Out the window of the Benzo we get seen in the rent'
[01:08.02]And I'm like "Woah man my neck so godd**n cold"
[01:14.19]Diamonds wet my t-shirt soaked
[01:17.63]I got homies let it go oh
[01:20.78]
[01:24.38]My money thick won't ever fold
[01:26.79]
[01:27.69]She said "Can I have some to hold"
[01:30.43]
[01:31.13]And I can't ever tell you no
[01:34.74]D**n my AP goin' psycho lil' mama bad like Michael
[01:38.46]Can't really trust nobody with all this jewelry on you
[01:41.84]My roof look like a no-show got diamonds by the boatload
[01:45.36]Come with the Tony Romo for clowns and all the bozos
[01:48.81]My AP goin' psycho lil' mama bad like Michael
[01:52.15]Can't really trust nobody with all this jewelry on you
[01:55.62]My roof look like a no-show got diamonds by the boatload
[01:58.95]Don't act like you my friend when I'm rollin' through my ends though
[02:02.38]Ty Dolla $ign：
[02:02.85]The AP goin' psycho my Rollie goin' brazy
[02:05.90]I'm hittin' lil' mama she wanna have my babies
[02:09.51]It's fifty on the pinky chain so stanky
[02:12.95]You should see the whip promise I can take yo' b***h
[02:15.92]Dolla ridin' in an old school Chevy it's a drop top
[02:19.75]Boolin' with a thot-thot she gon' give me top-top
[02:23.19]Just one switch I can make the a*s drop
[02:27.10]Hey
[02:27.98]Ayy take you to the smoke shop
[02:30.10]We gon' get high ayy we gon' hit Rodeo
[02:33.43]Dial up Valentino we gon' hit Pico
[02:36.95]Take you where I'm from take you to the slums
[02:39.90]This ain't happen overnight no these diamonds real bright
[02:43.77]Saint Laurent jeans still in my Vans though
[02:47.29]All VVS' put you in a necklace
[02:50.71]Girl you look beautiful tonight
[02:53.60]
[02:54.15]Stars on the roof they matching with the jewelry
[02:56.98]Post Malone：
[02:57.33]D**n my AP goin' psycho lil' mama bad like Michael
[03:00.74]Can't really trust nobody with all this jewelry on you
[03:04.29]My roof look like a no-show got diamonds by the boatload
[03:07.59]Come with the Tony Romo for clowns and all the bozos
[03:11.17]My AP goin' psycho lil' mama bad like Michael
[03:14.49]Can't really trust nobody with all this jewelry on you
[03:17.85]My roof look like a no-show got diamonds by the boatload
[03:21.34]Don't act like you my friend when I'm rollin' through my ends though
data.trans:
[ti:Psycho (Explicit)]
[ar:Post Malone/Ty Dolla $ign]
[al:Psycho]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.96]//
[00:05.93]//
[00:08.90]//
[00:11.87]//
[00:12.46]我带着钻石腕表 让人羡慕至极 我就像 Michael一样声名大噪
[00:16.11]你身上穿金戴银 却无法真正信任任何人
[00:19.57]开着敞篷豪车 我腰缠万贯
[00:22.96]你与Tony Romo一起到来 身边簇拥着那些凡夫俗子
[00:26.46]我带着钻石腕表 让人羡慕至极 我就像 Michael一样声名大噪
[00:29.87]你身上穿金戴银 却无法真正信任任何人
[00:33.26]开着敞篷豪车 我腰缠万贯
[00:36.82]不要假装你还是我的朋友 我已经亲手了断了一切
[00:40.35]你被我划分在朋友地带 我不会告诉你原因
[00:44.66]我拥有无数创意 其他人根本无法相提并论
[00:47.96]想要忍受你制造出来的噪音 但我根本无法适应
[00:51.45]你知道我那张流芳百世的专辑了吧
[00:54.71]我赚取了第一桶金 我是如此所向披靡
[00:58.30]我日程满满 伙计 我们忙得不可开交
[01:01.82]有这么多美酒 那就分给那些为我们疯狂的丑女孩们吧
[01:04.76]倚靠着奔驰豪车 我们为所欲为
[01:08.02]我是如此令人着迷
[01:14.19]钻石已经武装到我的牙齿
[01:17.63]我有很多兄弟 让我们尽情肆虐
[01:20.78]
[01:24.38]我拥有大笔财富 永不会落败
[01:26.79]
[01:27.69]她说 能否给我分享一些
[01:30.43]
[01:31.13]我永不会拒绝你的要求
[01:34.74]我带着钻石腕表 让人羡慕至极 我就像 Michael一样声名大噪
[01:38.46]你身上穿金戴银 却无法真正信任任何人
[01:41.84]开着敞篷豪车 我腰缠万贯
[01:45.36]你与Tony Romo一起到来 身边簇拥着那些凡夫俗子
[01:48.81]我带着钻石腕表 让人羡慕至极 我就像 Michael一样声名大噪
[01:52.15]你身上穿金戴银 却无法真正信任任何人
[01:55.62]开着敞篷豪车 我腰缠万贯
[01:58.95]不要假装你还是我的朋友 我已经亲手了断了一切
[02:02.38]//
[02:02.85]带着钻石腕表 让人羡慕至极 我的劳力士也闪耀至极
[02:05.90]我们身边美女如云 她想要给我生儿育女
[02:09.51]畅饮美酒 沉醉在音乐之中
[02:12.95]你注目的那辆豪车 我承诺会送给你
[02:15.92]现在我们开着雪佛兰 遵照传统
[02:19.75]尽情享乐 她让我感到无比开心
[02:23.19]急速奔驰 我会抛却一切烦恼
[02:27.10]//
[02:27.98]带你去往吞云吐雾之地
[02:30.10]我们会无比开心 我们要决一高下
[02:33.43]穿着奢侈品牌的衣服 我们风靡全场
[02:36.95]带你去我的出生地 带你去参观贫民区
[02:39.90]我们不要在午夜出行 因为我的钻石太过引人注目
[02:43.77]圣罗兰的衣服被我随意扔在车里
[02:47.29]顶级钻石项链才配得上你
[02:50.71]女孩 今晚你如此美艳无方
[02:53.60]
[02:54.15]坐进我的幻影里 才能配得上这些闪耀的珠宝
[02:56.98]//
[02:57.33]我带着钻石腕表 让人羡慕至极 我就像 Michael一样声名大噪
[03:00.74]你身上穿金戴银 却无法真正信任任何人
[03:04.29]开着敞篷豪车 我腰缠万贯
[03:07.59]你与Tony Romo一起到来 身边簇拥着那些凡夫俗子
[03:11.17]我带着钻石腕表 让人羡慕至极 我就像 Michael一样声名大噪
[03:14.49]你身上穿金戴银 却无法真正信任任何人
[03:17.85]开着敞篷豪车 我腰缠万贯
[03:21.34]不要假装你还是我的朋友 我已经亲手了断了一切
